item.title: How many things do I own?
item.description: In 2015 I moved in with Robert, who’s now my husband, and in 6 years, so many things have happened in my life. I got married, moved houses two times, adopted a dog, had a brief streaming career, discovered I have ADHD, changed jobs, and started taking my life career very seriously.Â Naturally, with all these changes in my life and the different focus I had over the years, I’ve amassed a very diverse amount of stuff that goes from lighting sets (my streamer period) to jewelry-making equipment.
